title: The locations puzzle
description: Doing this type of analysis is against the competition rulesIt has been pointed out by the competition admin that incorporating external data about distances between cities is against the rules. So please don't use this in any way for building your models! The locations puzzleExpedia presented us with a dataset where countries and cities are hidden behind integer codes. Is it possible to find out which city is which? Let's grab our pandas and find out :). Read in a few lines to get a list of columns.
